posts.post_content:
I have 16 nice cards for sale scan can be located in my community page ( Piedmont 150's Cards) on the Net 54 forum.

All cards 35.00 all are very nice for the grade. IF you require back scans I'll have to get them later on tonight, got anew computer and I need to load the scan software. Email preferred over PM PLEASE!

Get them while they are hot!

Cards are the following
McIntyre Hands over head SGC 20 NICE! SOLD
Hayden PSA 2 some minor creasing nice corners
Gasper SGC 40 NIce OLD MILL! no crease SOLD
Karger P150 PSA2 very nice
Parent PSA4 (mk) Great color
Phillipe PSA 2 nice! no crease SOLD
G. Brown Chicago P150 PSA3 corner wear SOLD
Rudolph PSA 2 very very nice 2 No crease
Mitchell PSA2 nice no crease SOLD
L. Tannehill PSA 2 see above! SOLD
Frill PSA2 spectacular for the grade looks like a 6 or 7 SOLD
Criss PSA 2 another beauty  SOLD
Charles PSA 2 same story
Burke PSA 2 again same story beautiful for the grade
Bowerman PSA 5! ( MK) nice card SOLD
Mattern SGC 40 a stunner in every way. Great for the grade. SOLD
Those who have bought form me know how nice all of my cards are for the grade. Enjoy.

Reduced price on all remaining cards is 30.00.
A bargain for the condition of these.
Thanks all.

Still 5 left folks

Parent
Karger
Burke
Rudolph 
Charles.

All very nice for the grade..

Thanks Doug. Card received in great shape !!!

Adam
